verses.roman:
prasāda pāñā sabe hailā ānandita mane
punarapi āilā sabe mahāprabhura sthāne

synonyms: prasāda pāñā—getting this honor of the garland; sabe—all of them; hailā—became; ānandita mane—pleased in the mind; punarapi—again; āilā—came back; sabe—all; mahāprabhura sthāne—to the place where Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu was staying.
translation: Everyone was pleased to receive this garland worn by Lord Jagannātha. Afterwards they all returned to the place where Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu was staying.
